mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place(placeNum, placeName, placeContent, mdPick,hitCount, created_date,ctgNum) VALUES(#{placeNum}, #{placeName}, #{placeContent}, #{mdPick},0,SYSDATE,#{ctgNum})
INSERT INTO placeImg(placeImgNum, placeImgName, placeNum,placeFileName,savePlace) VALUES (#{placeNum}, #{placeImgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeNum},#{placeFileName}, #{savePlace, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE place SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE placeNum = #{placeNum}
mapper.select: SELECT p.placeNum, placeName, placeContent, mdPick, ctgNum, hitCount, created_date, placeImgNum, placeImgName FROM place p LEFT OUTER JOIN placeImg pi ON p.placeNum = pi.placeNum WHERE p.placeNum = #{placeNum}

SELECT p.placeNum, placeName, placeContent, mdPick, ctgNum, hitCount, created_date, placeImgNum, placeImgName FROM place p LEFT OUTER JOIN placeImg pi ON p.placeNum = pi.placeNum
ORDER BY PlaceNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.placeNum, placeName, placeContent, mdPick, ctgNum, hitCount, created_date, placeImgNum, placeImgName FROM place p LEFT OUTER JOIN placeImg pi ON p.placeNum = pi.placeNum
ORDER BY PlaceNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
